title: Sue Hill: The Photographic Consultant

story.text: Sue Hill discovers her ability to freeze and manipulate time while in a client meeting, noticing time stands still as she phases through moments caught in her camera lens during a routine consulting session.
Testing her newfound powers, Sue freezes a moment to save a toddler from running into the road. She captures this heroic moment with her camera, blending her hobby with her powers.
Sue decides to use her powers for community good, discreetly stopping time to repair decaying urban areas, photographing the changes in series, creating before-and-after galleries.
During a photography walk, she stops a theft in progress by freezing time, collects evidence with her camera, and alerts the authorities, who arrive just as time resumes.
Local media start to notice changes in the neighborhood and a mysterious 'Good Samaritan.' Sue remains behind her lens, quietly appreciative of her secret contributions to the city.
Sue holds a private exhibit of her 'timeless moments' for friends and clients, hinting at her powers through the vibrant stories behind each photo.
Feeling fulfilled, Sue Hill takes a solitary sunset photo session, pondering how her unique blend of photography and time control can further contribute to societal reform.

ending: With every snapshot, Sue Hill masterfully wove her fate into the fabric of time, becoming the unseen guardian of her city.
